text: Fine. Haze in the afternoon. Force 2 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Fine, becoming cloudy. A few rain patches by the end of the day. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. A few rain patches at first. Force 2 to 3 north to northeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 2 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Temperature falling slightly. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
